title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.7 - Contract selection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.7 - Contract selection

State Regulations
(a) Foundation staff shall be responsible for ensuring that proposals are evaluated
on the basis of the criteria contained in section
5905.6
of this Part and shall make
a recommendation to the foundation's executive director as to whether a State
research contract should be awarded. (b) After receipt of the foundation staff's
recommendation, a determination shall be made by the foundation's executive
director, with approval by the foundation's board. (c) The foundation shall provide written
notification to a firm which has submitted an application for a State research
contract of the approval or disapproval of the application as soon as possible
after that decision is reached. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5905.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
